itunes:title: This Is the New Testament Week 2 with Kim Cash Tate
title: This Is the New Testament Week 2 with Kim Cash Tate
description:
Raechel and Amanda are joined for the second week of This Is the New Testament by author, Bible teacher, and singer/songwriter Kim Cash Tate. As the three women discuss Paul’s letters, from Romans to Ephesians, they identify the gospel at the heart of all of the apostle’s messages. Tune in for a lively discussion of what it means for a community of believers to live in response to the gospel in every season of life.


Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 2 of the She Reads Truth This Is the New Testament reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com. 

Shop the This Is the New Testament Reading Plan collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com. 

Show notes can be found at shereadstruth.com/podcast/this-is-the-new-testament-week-2-with-kim-cash-tate
